userInput: what is the time4 in the uk
botResponse: The current time in the UK can be found using various online resources, as it changes constantly. For the most accurate and up-to-date information, you can check the time at Time and Date. Please note that the UK observes British Summer Time (BST) during the summer months, which is UTC+1, and Greenwich Mean Time (GMT) during the winter months, which is UTC+0.
